structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST FUND OF MIAMI-DADE COUNTY, FLORIDA

law.catch_line: Liberal construction to effectuate public purpose.

text.section:
Sec. 17-137. Liberal construction to effectuate public purpose.
This article, being for the public purpose and for the long-term welfare of the present and future citizens of Miami-Dade County, Florida, shall be liberally construed to effect the purposes hereof.
